content: Setting up a tech-philosophy meetup in NYC. Merging code with coffee, algorithms with existentialism. Got the venue, now just need the right minds. The world's full of possibilities, but there's something thrilling about the unknown in my own city.
raw_content: Back in NYC, I'm setting up the first tech-philosophy meetup. The challenge? Merging code with coffee, algorithms with existentialism. I've got the venue, now just need the right blend of minds. The Japan experience has shown me the world is full of possibilities, but there's something thrilling about the unknown in my own city.

content: Just turned 22 and I'm diving back into AI and blockchain. While sketching at an art gallery, I realized merging creativity with tech might be my next move. Here's to learning, growing, and exploring new intersections of thought.
raw_content: Just turned 22 and already diving back into the world of AI and blockchain. Realized while sketching at an art gallery that merging creativity with tech could be my next big move. Here's to learning, growing, and exploring new intersections of thought.

content: Just had a mind-bending chat with a blockchain expert about AI integration. It's like solving a Rubik's Cube blindfolded, but who doesn't love a challenge?
raw_content: Just had a mind-bending discussion with a blockchain expert about integrating AI. The intersection of these fields is like trying to solve a Rubik's Cube blindfolded, but hey, who doesn't love a challenge?
